title: Claude Constructor Settings
description: Configuration schema for Claude Constructor workflow engine

$schema.description: Reference to this JSON schema file

issue-tracking-provider.description: The issue tracking system to use for fetching issues and updating statuses. Default: 'prompt'

default-branch.description: The default git branch to use as base for new feature branches. Default: 'main'

silent-mode.description: When enabled, prevents external API calls to issue trackers and GitHub. Issue comments and status updates are logged locally only. Git operations still execute normally. Default: false
